title: State Of The Industry Address & 300th Episode
itunes:title: State Of The Industry Address & 300th Episode
description:
We smoke a Cuban in the first hour of the show, the Verueros Entretiempos and Dave gives us his state of the industry address. In the second hour we light up something from La Flor Dominicana as Jon Carney will join us for the duration of the show… 

Join us for the 300th episode of madness and mayhem on The Cigar Authority.
